coreAttributes.name: clover clamps
coreAttributes.description: A pair of metal clover clamps designed to tightly pinch onto the wearer's nipples. The attached weights pull down to apply a constant, painful pressure.

displacementText.playerSelf: You carefully remove the clover clamps from your [pc.nipples+].
displacementText.playerNPC: You carefully remove the clover clamps from [npc.Name]'s [npc.nipples+].
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You give [npc.name]'s clover clamps a rough tug, then remove them from [npc.herHis] [npc.nipples+].
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] carefully removes the clover clamps from [npc.herHis] [npc.nipples+].
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] carefully removes the clover clamps from your [pc.nipples+].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] gives your clover clamps a rough tug, then removes them from your [pc.nipples+].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] carefully removes the clover clamps from [npc2.name]'s [npc2.nipples+].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] gives [npc2.name]'s clover clamps a rough tug, then removes them from [npc2.herHis] [npc2.nipples+].

replacementText.playerSelf: You wince as you affix the clover clamps to your [pc.nipples+].
replacementText.playerNPC: [npc.name] winces as you affix the clover clamps to [npc.herHis] [npc.nipples+].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You affix the clover clamps to [npc.name]'s [npc.nipples+], giving them a sharp tug.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] winces as [npc.sheHe] affixes the clover clamps to [npc.herHis] [npc.nipples+].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: You wince as [npc.name] affixes the clover clamps to your [pc.nipples+].
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] affixes the clover clamps to your [pc.nipples+], giving them a sharp tug.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc2.Name] winces as [npc1.Name] affixes the clover clamps to [npc2.herHis] [npc2.nipples+].
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] affixes the clover clamps to [npc2.Name]'s [npc2.nipples+], giving them a sharp tug.
